name: Crazy Golf In Space
description:
Crazy Golf In Space

Welcome to Crazy Golf in Space, this mini golf game has plenty of atmosphere with laser toting aliens, spinning planets, invading aliens, robots and monsters.

Join us for 9 holes of mini golf that's really out of this world.

Its a 32 par course, but it will take some practice to make it round in so few shots.

Its easy to play, just tap in the direction you want the golf ball to go. Tap close to the ball to hit it softly, tap further away to give it a good belt!

That's it, its crazy and its golf and its out of this world. Download “Crazy Golf in Space” now.
